page.title: 19EMPLOYMENT _ CENTENARIAN
page.content: Playing Field used by Caravan Club for occasional weekends. FOOTPATHS _ 7 designated footpaths but mostly ploughed up due to changed farming methods and not usable. Only 2 used regularly including Viking Way. EMPLOYMENT_Many employed in businesses already referred to but wide range of occupations for those going outside village including Managing Director of Tractor Company, Headmaster,teachers, Hairdresser, Shop Assistants, Bank & Office workers, Hospital Staff,Factory workers to mention but a few. CENTENARIAN _ Mrs.Lizzie Adams is 101 and has lived for a ninth of the 900 years since the Domesday Book was written _ an unbeatable fraction.Born in village and her Mother kept the Black Horse.Used to sing & dance and enjoyed shooting with her husband who was killed in WWI.Walking History Book
